sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>mountain</radical> on top of the <radical>cliff</radical> is <radical>dry</radical> from the <kanji>coast</kanji> below. Just from looking at the raging <kanji>shore</kanji> below, you'd think everything would be wet, it's splashing everywhere!
meaningInfo: You're on top of the mountain and the entire coast is stretching out below. The shore goes as far as your eyes can see.
readingMnemonic: Sitting up there, watching the <kanji>coast</kanji> with you, is <reading>Gan</reading>dhi (<ja>がん</ja>). The world famous Gandhi, is just hanging out up here with you, looking down at what you now realize must be a coast in India.
readingInfo: Sit down next to Gandhi and close your eyes. You can hear the water hitting the shore below. The coastal birds are screaming. You crack open an eye and see Gandhi still sitting perfectly still.
